name: Introduction to English Literature
description: A course introducing the basics of English Literature from its earliest forms to the present day.

name: Medieval Literature
description: A course covering the literature of the Middle Ages, from Old English to the Renaissance.

name: Renaissance Literature
description: A course covering the literature of the Renaissance period, from the 16th century to the late 17th century.

name: Early Modern Literature
description: A course covering the literature of the Early Modern period, from the late 17th century to the early 19th century.
